# thisdataismine

This repository contains an **R** package including data sets.
Those data sets should be available for tutorials and examples.

# How to install it
For its installation you require previously and installation of the package
`devtools`.
Then, you can install the last version of `thisdataismine` by following command
lines:

```{r,eval=FALSE}
library(devtools)
install_github("kamapu/thisdataismine")
```

Enjoy it!
